class foo {
	static {
		this.test = 1;
	}
	static {
		this.test2 = 2;
	}
}
/**************************************************/
class foo{static{this.test=1;}static{this.test2=2;}}
/**************************************************/
class foo
{
	static
	{
		this.test = 1;
	}
	static
	{
		this.test2 = 2;
	}
}
